tweak.tweakDescription: This tweak allows you to decrypt any app on iOS11-12. This works on Electra (iOS 11 only) and Unc0ver jailbreaks. You can remove WatchKit and remove UISupportedDevices from the info.plist in settings.
tweak.tweakChangelog: • Initial release on my repo with c0pyninja's permission • Option to Decrypt Binary only • Compatible with iOS 12 and unc0ver only • Minor Fixes
